scripts.desktop:build: npm run desktop:app && npm run desktop:cp
scripts.format:check:
bash -lc '
set -euo pipefail
BASE="origin/main...HEAD"

# 1) Fichiers committ√©s dans la plage
A=$(git diff --name-only "$BASE" --diff-filter=ACMRTUXB || true)

# 2) Fichiers staged
B=$(git diff --name-only --cached --diff-filter=ACMRTUXB || true)

# 3) Fichiers unstaged
C=$(git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMRTUXB || true)

FILES=$(printf "%s
%s
%s
" "$A" "$B" "$C" | sed "/^$/d" | sort -u)

if [ -z "$FILES" ]; then
  echo "OK: no files to format"
  exit 0
fi

echo "Prettier check files:"
echo "$FILES" | sed "s/^/ - /"

npx prettier --check --ignore-unknown $FILES
'
scripts.dev:both: bash -lc 'npm run dev:reset && (npm run dev:app & npm run dev:cp & wait)'
scripts.desktop:dev:both: bash -lc '(npm run desktop:dev:app & npm run desktop:dev:cp & wait)'
